select_language_note: Note: Your chosen language does not affect the response language of the robot
welcome_description: Start a conversation with Botrick to unlock knowledge, creativity, and friendly interaction. Embark on an exciting journey with your AI companion and let technology enhance your everyday life.
seek_inromation_description: Botrick can serve as a powerful information resource. You can ask questions about a wide range of topics, such as history, science, sports, or current events, and receive informative and detailed responses.
get_recommendations_description: Whether you're looking for movie recommendations, book suggestions, or travel destinations, Botrick can provide personalized recommendations based on your preferences and interests.
creative_writing_description: If you need help with writing stories, essays, or other creative pieces, Botrick can provide suggestions, brainstorm ideas, and offer guidance, and help elevate your writing to the next level.
image_generation_description: Botrick can create original images based on textual prompts. You can describe an object, a scene, or a concept, and Botrick will generate a corresponding image that matches your description.
example_1: Explain quantum computing in simple terms
example_2: How do I bake a chocolate cake?
example_3: Can you tell me a joke?
capabilities_1: Remembers what user said earlier in the conversation
capabilities_2: Allows user to provide follow-up corrections
limitations_2: May occasionally produce harmful instructions or biased content
limitations_3: Limited knowledge of world and events after 2021
chat_description: Get a quick response to any query
cannot_change_theme_message: Wait until you receive the answer
